Monitor.​ViewApp.​Converters.​StringToUppercaseConverter
IValueConverter
public
Monitor.​ViewApp.​Converters.​StringToUppercaseConverter

StringToUppercaseConverter is an helper class for WPF MVVM pattern.  This converter switch all characters to UPPER-CASE
